cta.readyTitle: Ready to Commit to Your Goals?

features.title: 1. Create Challenge
features.description: Set your goal and stake money on completing it. The higher the stakes, the more motivated you'll be.

features.title: 2. Build Your Squad
features.description: Invite 1-5 friends as accountability partners. They'll verify your progress and keep you honest.

features.title: 3. Submit Proof
features.description: Upload photos or videos as proof. Your squad can challenge invalid submissions.

features.title: 4. Win or Learn
features.description: Complete your challenge to get your money back. Fail, and your squad splits the stake.
